thread.title: Trump Starts Rally by Attacking Media: I Will Never Let the Media ‘Get Away’ With Lies
thread.title_full: Trump Starts Rally by Attacking Media: I Will Never Let the Media ‘Get Away’ With Lies

author: Josh Feldman
title: Trump Starts Rally by Attacking Media: I Will Never Let the Media ‘Get Away’ With Lies
text:
Trump Starts Rally by Attacking Media: I Will Never Let the Media ‘Get Away’ With Lies by Josh Feldman | 6:04 pm, February 18th, 2017 
The first big topic of President Trump ‘s Florida rally today was, of course, the “fake news” media. 
He said he wanted to talk to the American people “without the filter of the fake news,” which he said has continued to publish “one false story after another” and make things up. 
Trump charged that the press has become a “big part of the problem” and declared, “When the media lies to people, I will never ever let them get away with it. I will do whatever I can… They have their own agenda, and their agenda is not your agenda.” 
The president — who cited presidents past and their criticisms of the media — told the excited crowd that they will not let the “fake news tell us what to do, how to live, and what to believe.” 
Watch above, via CNN.
